full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO GSER GYI LAG PA'I SMON LAM DANG 'BREL BA'I MAR ME JI LTAR 'BUL BA'I TSUL BDE LEGS 'BYUNG GNAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN RNAM DPYOD LDAN PA'I TSE GZUNGS SOGS KYIS 'DI LTAR GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO BOR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS G-YAR KHRAL DU BGYIS PA'O, ,PAR 'DI NI MI RGEN MKHAN SPRUL GYI MING 'DZIN RTEN 'BREL BKRA SHIS KYIS DAD PAS SGRUBS PA'I DGE @026B BA'I RTZA BA 'DIS SEMS CAN MA LUS PA'I MA RIG PA'I MUN PA SEL NAS YE SHES KYI SNANG BA RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , BDAG GI JI SNYED BSAGS PA'I DGE BA 'DI, ,BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA KUN LA GANG PHAN DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG GRAGS PA YI, ,BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO RING DU GSAL BYED SHOG , RAB TU RNAM DAG TSUL KHRIMS MCHOG RKONG DU, ,RAB RTAN TING 'DZIN ZHUN @027A *, ,MAR SDONG BU LAS, ,RAB ZAB SHES RAB ME LCE 'BAR BA YIS, ,RAB RMONGS MTHAR 'DZIN MUN PA DRUNGS 'BYIN SHOG ,DRI ZHIM DANG LDAN PA DUG SPOS DAM PA 'DI, ,BLA MA RGYAL BA SRAS DANG BCAS LA 'BUL PHUL BA'I DGE BA'I BDAG DANG 'GRO BA KUN, ,TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG DRI DANG LDAR PAR SHOG , ,,)
